column4: does anyone know what the default name and password is for a standard Windows XP machine is? Samba keeps asking me for a name and pass and Its not responding to what I give it for my user login
command line browser?
do you mean  something you can use in a desktop/windows area?
like lynx, links, elinks ...
are those like xterm?
no
but you use them i e g xterm
Can you please explain these other programs such as lynx? Im trying to learn about these things :)
like firefox but you use a terminal
Ahh ok, thanks for that.  Do you know of other things besides xterm?
i know alot of things. anything special you are thinking about?

Im sorry I wasnt specific. I am using XFCE and what comes standard there is Xterm, and Its interface is very inflexible. I like what I had under Gnome, but XFCE is much better for me because of some minimal equipment I have.
do you want another xterm-like terminal?
Yes that would be my desire.
Xterm is white on black, and small fonts. I'd like to get something that I can at least modify a little.
that would be eterm
but i can also recommend aterm
thank you for your insight :)
but eterm is easier to modify than aterm
I'll try eterm first and see if that meets my needs. Again, thank you :)
sudo apt-get install eterm
Looked at both Eterm and aterm, still not quite as nice as the Konsole. Do you happen to know if Konsole will run under xfce?
